hackathon-description-text: This hackathon is meant to bring women in our community together to build, share, and learn!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Program Director at the Tech Incubator
Director, QC Center for Teaching & Learning

hackathon-rules: Be respectful. Harassment and abuse are never tolerated.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=65-30 Kissena Blvd, Flushing, NY 11367, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Develop a supportive community for students by implementing both face to face and online interactions between students and faculty mentors. How an app could be developed to enable easy communication between students and mentors

hackathon-description-header: Create, collaborate and code with your sisters!
